top_right.text: Choose apartments in a location boasting a superb climate, ensuring you and your family have access to prestigious infrastructure, maximum privacy, and fantastic views of both the sea and Sierra Bermeja mountains

bottom_left.title: The New Golden Mile serves as an appealing locale for both seasonal holidaymakers and individuals in search of a permanent home:

left.text: Most terraces offer stunning sea views
Well-maintained green space in front of the building, bike paths leading to the sea and promenade

right.text: 500 meters to a pristine beach, just a 6-minute walk
5 minutes by car to Estepona's city center, with all urban conveniences close by
50 minutes' drive to two airports: Malaga and Gibraltar

partners.item1: We collaborate with companies from Spain and Europe that are ready to take an active role in the construction of residential and commercial properties, as well as serve as suppliers of building materials, tools, and construction services.
partners.item2: We offer favorable cooperation terms and the opportunity to expand your project portfolio. If you are prepared to become our partner or contractor, please submit an application, and our specialist will contact you to discuss the details of our collaboration.

news.title: Stay updated on construction news
news.subtitle: We publish news about the progress of our construction projects
news.text: New Project Launch! The commencement of a new project by Swiss Technology is the perfect occasion to share some news! We are launching a significant project: a new building with 29 apartments in the picturesque and prestigious New Golden Mile location. As of mid-March, the land purchase deal has been closed. At present, a competition has been conducted to select the project's architect - the final appearance of the new building depends on their vision. The specialist is working on the project, and we will soon reveal the details. Stay tuned for updates!
